comment: When I started to watch his lectures, I felt he is the gifted prof
this guy is simply amazing. thank you god and thank you to his mum
Sooo Who is the girl with the camo pants and the NASA jacket?
This guy is a hero, give him a oscar of chemistry

Thank YOU very much for lesson ❤ I am huge sorry becouse of that "plastic-ocean" PROBLEM 😞 But in the other hand I understand people who want to eat yogurts, white/yellow cheese, drink milk and... they don't want to buy a cow 😜 and they don't want to stand for half a day... to cook cheese at home (EVERY DAY). I also don't want to spend my whole life in the kitchen 😜 but I don't buy (and drink) bottled water - NEVER. I drink ONLY water, every day, a lot of, becouse I am SPORT woman 😁 and I really don't know why most people are so afraid of this. YOU are my favourite Teacher. I love YOU, MR. 😁 YOU ARE AWESOME! THANK YOU ONCE AGAIN 😁 ❤
Such a wonderful class! i would like to be sit down in that place where all these students are!
This is better than netflix series!
Excelente professor ....as exlicações são muito claras
